data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Promdam, Rueangrit, Ng, Peter K. L. (2009): Lithoselatium tantichodoki, a new species of intertidal crab (Crustacea: Brachyura: Sesarmidae) from southern Thailand. Zootaxa 2291: 24-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191392
